name: Fario's Cheddar Cheese Quest
description:
Behold the ultimate stupid joke game, you'll either hate it or love it. From the creator Lerrycapetime who brought you many different games before but none quite like this, so this is definitely a step back from the norm.

"The best story to any Kario fan game ever"

500+ hours of gameplay

10+ Levels

Unlockable Upgrades

"Funny" memes

Embark on an epic quest to retrieve your stolen Cheez-It box with many strange threats along the journey. Do you have what it takes or will you rage quit?
